trans-unit.source: Describes the service’s authentication behavior.
trans-unit.target: 描述服務驗證行為。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthenticationBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthenticationBehavior" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that represents the authentication scheme used by the service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示服務使用的驗證配置。

trans-unit.source: The authentication scheme used by the service.
trans-unit.target: 由服務所使用的驗證配置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager" /> associated with this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此行為相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the service should serialize authentication schemes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回服務是否應序列化驗證機制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the service should serialize authentication schemes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果服務應序列化驗證配置，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager" /> should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該序列化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthenticationManager" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: The service description of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務的服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The host of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務的主機。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Custom objects to which binding elements have access.
trans-unit.target: 繫結項目可存取的自訂物件。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase,System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase,System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)" /> 方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: This method is called once for each listen URI.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會針對每個接聽 URI 呼叫一次。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a service has four endpoints, and two of them have the same listen URI, then this method gets called three times.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果服務有四個端點，其中兩個具有相同的接聽 URI，便會呼叫這個方法三次。

trans-unit.source: The reason is that the `bindingParameters` target each channel stack and there is one channel stack for each listen URI.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為 `bindingParameters` 是以每個通道堆疊為目標，且每個接聽 URI 都有一個通道堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Because each call receives those endpoints at that listen URI, two calls each get a single <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>, and one call gets a collection of two <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: 由於每個呼叫都會收到該接聽 URI 上的這些端點，因此兩個呼叫會分別取得單一 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>，而一個呼叫會取得兩個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The host that is currently being built.
trans-unit.target: 目前正在建置的主機。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" /> 方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The service host that is currently being constructed.
trans-unit.target: 目前正在建構的服務主機。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthenticationBehavior.System#ServiceModel#Description#IServiceBehavior#Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthenticationBehavior.System#ServiceModel#Description#IServiceBehavior#Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" /> 方法的實作。
